short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Syncs videos for people watching the same video at the same time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Users should open the same video on the same service (youtube, netflix, or local file), then click the "Movie Date" icon to begin a session. Your peers' progress should be displayed, and you can sync your own progress to match you peer!
